name: LightCube (Coockie1173)
description:
A game where you can only jump when you're in the light. This game has some platforming and an easter egg (which will be spoiled near the end of this description).

This game was made for the Brackeys game jam. Every asset is self made (except for the font).  Linux is supported.

To trigger the easter egg, please hold S for 5 seconds on the main menu.
